hero.description:
I'm a 23-year-old web developer fluent in English, Romanian, Russian, and Italian.
My focus is on practical solutions that work for you.
Let's build a strong online presence together.

experience.backstageit: Frontend developer atBackstageIT

backstage.one: Full cycle software development of a secure document template sharing app.
backstage.two: Utilized GraphQL, and Apollo to develop a cohesive user experience.
backstage.four: Worked on consolidating multiple legacy websites into one unified system.
backstage.five: Utilized code quality tools like Husky, ESLint, and SonarCloud to enhance the overall quality of the code and achieve a code coverage of 95%...

experience.sooneat-title: Fullstack developer atSooneat

sooneat.one: Led development of a full stack web application enabling users to consolidate orders from multiple restaurants into a single platform.
sooneat.two: Implemented frontend functionality using JavaScript, React, and Redux, ensuring seamless user experiences.
sooneat.three: Utilized Firebase for back end operations to enhance app performance and scalability.
sooneat.four: Spearheaded regular feature enhancements and bug fixes, optimizing app functionality and resolving issues.
sooneat.five: Managed deployments and ensured the app maintained high availability and stability.

experience.dynamicbox-title: Frontend developer at<a aria-label='DynamicBox' class='underline' href='https://dynamicbox.it/' target='_blank' class='w-1/5 min-w-20' >DynamicBox</a >

dynamicbox.one: Acquired proficiency in React, TypeScript, and Redux through hands-on experience during initial job role.
dynamicbox.two: Collaborated in code reviews and collaborated with senior developers to refine coding practices and ensure adherence to best practices.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.first-paragraph: As a 23-year-old web developer with a passion for crafting immersive digital experiences, I thrive on merging the technical and visual elements of digital products. User experience, precise design, and the art of writing clear, performant code are my cornerstones.
about-me.second-paragraph: Embarking on my web development journey in 2020, I've embraced challenges and constantly evolved, staying at the forefront of the latest technologies. Now, with 3 years of experience, I specialize in building cutting-edge web applications using tools like React.js, Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwindcss, and more.
about-me.third-paragraph: When I'm not busy coding, catch me rolling around on my skateboard, soaking up the street vibes. And when I need a breakfrom the tech world, I dive into fantasy books and mangaâ€”getting lost in epic tales and cool illustrations. Check out my GitHub for code stuff!

lets-talk.title:
Let's talk for
something special
lets-talk.description: I'm currently available for freelance work. If you have a project that you want to get started, think you need my help with something or just fancy saying hey, then get in touch.

footer.credit: Designed in Figma, credit to Jhanvi Shah

contact-form.subject: Subject: I want to hire you for a project.
contact-form.body: Describe your project. If it involves unicorns, free pizza, or time travel, i'm definitely interested!
